title: 挪威科学家发现武汉病毒是来自实验室的重要证据(基因片段)
contents:
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2020/06/03/exclusive-coronavirus-began-accident-disease-escaped-chinese/

Coronavirus began 'as an accident' in Chinese lab - X-MI6 boss Dearlove, citing "a scientific paper... by a Norwegian-British research team who claim to have discovered clues within Covid-19's genetic sequence suggesting key elements were "inserted"
